Name: DotLine
About the game: Dotline is a challenging minimalist Puzzle Game Click on puzzle elements to drive the ball to the exit without falling into the void. Try and retry to win and have the best possible score. Features 8 acts for more than 70 standard levels 9 bonus levels to unlock challenge levels stars, snowflakes and flashes to catch to get more score points accelerate (space bar) to win more score points Steam achievements
